For distributed computation with communication cost T(v‚ÇÅ, v‚ÇÇ) between gates mapped to different processors, and resource consumption R(G, M), we add: 

T(v‚ÇÅ, v‚ÇÇ) = data_size(v‚ÇÅ, v‚ÇÇ) / bandwidth(M(v‚ÇÅ), M(v‚ÇÇ))
